select w.workflow_id,w.workflow_name,w.workflow_group_id,ws.workflow_step_id,wsn.workflow_step_node_id,wn.workflow_node_id from sys_workflow w join sys_workflow_step ws on w.workflow_id = ws.workflow_id join sys_workflow_step_node wsn on ws.workflow_step_id = wsn.workflow_step_id join sys_workflow_node wn on wn.workflow_step_node_id = wsn.workflow_step_node_id
join (select ws.sort_order setp_sort_order,wn.sort_order node_sort_order from sys_workflow_step ws join sys_workflow_step_node wsn on ws.workflow_step_id = wsn.workflow_step_id join sys_workflow_node wn on wn.workflow_step_node_id = wsn.workflow_step_node_id where wn.workflow_node_id = #{workflowNodeId}) a on 1=1
where w.workflow_id = #{workflowId}
and ((ws.sort_order = a.setp_sort_order and wn.sort_order > a.node_sort_order) or (ws.sort_order > a.setp_sort_order))
order by ws.sort_order,wn.sort_order limit 1
